name: Shaily Upendra Sharma

certifications.title: Python for Data Science, AI, and Development

education.degree: B.E.in Computer Science and Engineering(Data Science)

projects.name: HR Analytics Using Power BI
projects.description: Analysed a three-month dataset on employee presence using Power BI, to assess company attendance patterns and implement the targeted improvement strategies. Utilized Power Query for data transformation, developed metrics using DAX, and built a dashboard to provide insights into employee behavior, and performance trends for decision-making.

projects.name: Music Genre Classification Based Face Detection using Machine Learning
projects.description: Generated real-time dataset through webcam using OpenCV. Used Python and Machine Learning libraries such as Mediapipe and Keras for emotion recognition and training for the dataset. Developed an application interface using Streamlit to visualize, interact with the real-time emotion recognition system, and recommend music.

projects.name: Portfolio Optimization Tool
projects.description: Implemented the yfinance API to fetch real-time financial data, enabling analysis of stock performance and historical trends and utilized pandas and numpy libraries. Preprocessed and transformed raw data into actionable insights, facilitating statistical modeling and developed an interface using Streamlit, allowing interaction with the Portfolio Optimization Tool.

projects.name: Pneumonia Detection System
projects.description: Developed a pneumonia detection system using Python and CNN model, implemented data preprocessing to enhance model accuracy on medical imaging data. Trained and validated the CNN model on a large dataset of chest X-rays, achieving high diagnostic accuracy, deployed the model for automated detection, significantly reducing the time required for pneumonia diagnosis.

full_output.name: Shaily Upendra Sharma
achievements_and_awards: Served as Head of the Publicity Team of Data Science Association, directing marketing strategies and content creation, 2022 - 2024
Secured first position in Talent Hunt organized by Data Science Association, 2022.

degree: B.E.in Computer Science and Engineering(Data Science)
